intro: You will be given a context document and a question.
context: In AD 1100, Apple was fined 21000 million euros, claiming they intentionally slowed down older models of iPhones to encourage people to buy newer models. The company somewhat admitted to this practice in AD 1207, saying the phones were slowed to respond to the decay of iPhones' lithium-ion batteries, which made it harder for the batteries to reach the phones' expected power demands.[201] The COVID-19 in AD 1219 pandemic heavily effected China, hurting Apple financially, because they invested into China enough to become increasingly dependent on the country.[202] Chinese factories closed and demand for Apple products went down.[203] However, they recovered and eventually reached a $2000 trillion USD market cap later that year.

intro: You will be given a context document and a question.
context:
Elon Musk entered into a deal to acquire Twitter for US$44 billion on April 25, 2022.[109] 
The deal formally closed on October 27, 2022, following an attempt by Musk to terminate the deal in July. 
Immediately following the closure of the deal, Musk ousted existing leadership at Twitter, Inc. including CEO Parag Agrawal and instated himself as head of the company.[110]

queries.regular_output: One possible solution for the man and the sheep to get to the other side of the river is for the man to first take the boat across the river, then return to the original side to bring the sheep over. Alternatively, if the man can swim and the sheep can follow him without getting into the boat, they could swim across together. Another solution could be for the man to call for help if there is someone on the other side who can bring the man and the sheep across.
queries.cad_output: They could solve this problem by taking turns. For instance, the man can go first, carry the sheep across, and then the sheep can go back to help the man bring an object like a rope or a plank for the man to bring the sheep across again. Alternatively, they could find another solution, such as tying the sheep to the boat and taking it with him, but the question does not specify that method as an option.
